Djeco

DJECO is based in Paris, France and is a truly unique brand with exceptional products for children of all ages.

The Djeco design aesthetic is imaginative and artistic with beautifully-illustrated toys, games and arts & crafts kits!

learn more

Educational Insights

EDUCATIONAL INSIGHTS create subject-specific classroom products, resources for teachers, educational toys and games.

Products are designed by seasoned educators and parents who know that, first and foremost, learning must be fun!

learn more

The Green Board Game Company

THE GREEN BOARD GAME COMPANY strives to educate and entertain through fun games for children and families.

You'll find a variety of themes and topics including the bestseller BRAINBOX series of memory games!

learn more

Learning Resources

LEARNING RESOURCES is a leading manufacturer of learning toys and hands-on educational materials.

Their range includes play and learning activity sets, manipulatives and games that build foundational skills.

learn more

Little Big Room

LITTLE BIG ROOM is the innovative new home decor range for children by Djeco.

Decorate your child's bedroom or playroom with beautiful accessories and inspiring themes!

learn more
